content.text: 3 (10 ounce) packages frozen chopped spinach, thawed
content.eamr: ( ing-0 "3 (10 ounce) packages frozen chopped spinach, thawed" )
( ing-1 "3 eggs" )
( ing-2 "1/2 teaspoon onion salt" )
( ing-3 "1/2 teaspoon ground nutmeg" )
( ing-4 "3/4 cup grated Parmesan cheese, divided" )
( ing-5 "3/4 cup Italian seasoned bread crumbs" )
( ing-6 "16 skinless, boneless chicken breast halves" )
( ing-7 "salt and pepper to taste" )
( ing-8 "5 tablespoons butter or margarine, melted" )
( ing-9 "6 tablespoons butter or margarine, divided" )
( ing-10 "1/4 cup all-purpose flour" )
( ing-11 "1/2 teaspoon salt" )
( ing-12 "2 cups milk" )
( ing-13 "2 cups shredded Cheddar cheese" )
( ing-14 "1 cup sliced fresh mushrooms" )

content.text: 0) Drain and squeeze out excess moisture from spinach.
1) Beat eggs, onion salt and nutmeg.
content.eamr:
( inst-1 / R
	:inform ( ac-1-0 "Beat"@3:7 / AC
		:ppt ( ing-1 "eggs"@8:12 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-2 "onion salt"@14:24 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-3 "nutmeg"@29:35 / FOOD )
	)
)

content.text: 2) Add spinach and 1/4 cup Parmesan cheese; mix well.
3) Combine bread crumbs and remaining Parmesan.
4) Sprinkle chicken with salt and pepper; coat with crumb mixture.
5) Place in two greased 13-in baking pans.
6) Spread 2 tablespoons spinach mixture onto each breast.
7) Sprinkle with remaining crumb mixture; drizzle with butter.
8) Bake at 350 degrees F for 35-40 minutes or until chicken juices run clear.
content.eamr:
( inst-8 / R
	:inform ( ac-8-0 "Bake"@4:8 / AC
		:heat ( temp-8-0 "350 degrees F"@12:25 / TEMPERATURE )
		:duration ( dur-8-0 "35-40 minutes"@30:43 / DUR )
		:until ( cond-8-0 "until chicken juices run clear"@47:77 / CONDITION_CLAUSE )
	)
)

content.text: 9) For sauce, melt 4 tablespoons butter; blend in flour and salt.
content.eamr:
( inst-9 / R
	:inform ( ac-9-0 "melt"@15:19 / AC
		:subtask ( "For sauce"@4:13 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-9 "4 tablespoons butter"@20:40 / FOOD )
	)
	:inform ( ac-9-1 "blend in"@42:50 / AC
		:ppt ( ing-10 "flour"@51:56 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-11 "salt"@61:65 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( NULL / FOOD )
	)
)

content.text: 10) Stir to form a smooth paste.
11) Add milk; cook and stir until thickened and bubbly.
12) Add cheese and stir until melted.
15) Carefully pour sauce over chicken, or pour into a serving bowl and pass.
